title: titan: avoid to hold global mutex while syncing titan manifest
body:

6.5, 7.1 and master

### What operating system and CPU are you using?
<!-- If you're using Linux, you can run `cat /proc/cpuinfo` -->

amd / arm

### Steps to reproduce
<!-- If possible, provide a recipe for reproducing the error. A complete runnable program is good. -->

Turn on Titan, and run writing workload.

### What did you expect?

### What did happened?

Global mutex slowed down the write speed.
